verses.verse: Now these are those who came <WH935> to David <WH1732> to Ziklag, <WH6860> while he yet kept himself close <WH6113> because <WH6440> of Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish; <WH7027> and they were among the mighty men, <WH1368> his helpers <WH5826> in war. <WH4421>

They were armed <WH5401> with bows, <WH7198> and could use both the right hand <WH3231> and the left <WH8041> in slinging stones <WH68> and in shooting arrows <WH2671> from the bow: <WH7198> they were of Saul <WH7586>'s brothers <WH251> of Benjamin. <WH1144>

The chief <WH7218> was Ahiezer; <WH295> then Joash, <WH3101> the sons <WH1121> of Shemaah <WH8094> the Gibeathite, <WH1395> and Jeziel, <WH3149> and Pelet, <WH6404> the sons <WH1121> of Azmaveth, <WH5820> and Beracah, <WH1294> and Jehu <WH3058> the Anathothite, <WH6069>

and Ishmaiah <WH3460> the Gibeonite, <WH1393> a mighty man <WH1368> among the thirty, <WH7970> and over the thirty, <WH7970> and Jeremiah, <WH3414> and Jahaziel, <WH3166> and Johanan, <WH3110> and Jozabad <WH3107> the Gederathite, <WH1452>
Eluzai, <WH498> and Jerimoth, <WH3406> and Bealiah, <WH1183> and Shemariah, <WH8114> and Shephatiah <WH8203> the Haruphite, <WH2741>
Elkanah, <WH511> and Isshiah, <WH3449> and Azarel, <WH5832> and Joezer, <WH3134> and Jashobeam, <WH3434> the Korahites, <WH7145>
and Joelah, <WH3132> and Zebadiah, <WH2069> the sons <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395> of Gedor. <WH1446>

Of the Gadites <WH1425> there separated <WH914> themselves to David <WH1732> to the stronghold <WH4679> in the wilderness, <WH4057> mighty <WH2428> men <WH1368> of valor, <WH6635> men <WH582> trained for war, <WH4421> that could handle <WH6186> shield <WH6793> and spear; <WH7420> whose faces <WH6440> were like the faces <WH6440> of lions, <WH738> and they were as swift <WH4116> as the roes <WH6643> on the mountains; <WH2022>
Ezer <WH5829> the chief, <WH7218> Obadiah <WH5662> the second, <WH8145> Eliab <WH446> the third, <WH7992>
Mishmannah <WH4925> the fourth, <WH7243> Jeremiah <WH3414> the fifth, <WH2549>
Attai <WH6262> the sixth, <WH8345> Eliel <WH447> the seventh, <WH7637>
Johanan <WH3110> the eighth, <WH8066> Elzabad <WH443> the ninth, <WH8671>
Jeremiah <WH3414> the tenth, <WH6224> Machbannai <WH4344> the eleventh. <WH6249>

These of the sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> were captains <WH7218> of the army: <WH6635> he <WH259> who was least <WH6996> was equal to one hundred, <WH3967> and the greatest <WH1419> to one thousand. <WH505>

These are those who went over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> in the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> when it had overflowed <WH4390> all its banks; <WH1415> and they put to flight <WH1272> all them of the valleys, <WH6010> both toward the east, <WH4217> and toward the west. <WH4628>
There came <WH935> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> and Judah <WH3063> to the stronghold <WH4679> to David. <WH1732>

David <WH1732> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH6440> them, <WH6030> and answered them, <WH559> "If you have come <WH935> peaceably <WH7965> to me to help <WH5826> me, <WH3824> my heart shall be knit <WH3162> to you; <WH7411> but if you have come to betray me to my adversaries, <WH6862> since there is no <WH3808> wrong <WH2555> in my hands, <WH3709> may the God <WH430> of our fathers <WH1> look <WH7200> thereon, <WH3198> and rebuke it."

Then the Spirit <WH7307> came <WH3847> on Amasai, <WH6022> who was chief <WH7218> of the thirty, <WH7970> and he said, <WH1732> "We are yours, David, and on your side, <WH1121> you son of Jesse: <WH3448> peace, <WH7965> peace <WH7965> be to you, <WH7965> and peace be to your helpers; <WH5826> for your God <WH430> helps you. <WH1732>" Then David received <WH6901> them, <WH5414> and made them captains <WH7218> of the band. <WH1416>

Of Manasseh <WH4519> also there fell <WH5307> away some to David, <WH1732> when he came <WH935> with the Philistines <WH6430> against Saul <WH7586> to battle; <WH4421> but they didn't <WH5826> help them; <WH5633> for the lords of the Philistines <WH6430> sent <WH7971> him away after consultation, <WH6098> saying, <WH559> "He will fall <WH5307> away to his master <WH113> Saul <WH7586> to the jeopardy of our heads. <WH7218>"

As he went <WH3212> to Ziklag, <WH6860> there fell <WH5307> to him of Manasseh, <WH4519> Adnah, <WH5734> and Jozabad, <WH3107> and Jediael, <WH3043> and Michael, <WH4317> and Jozabad, <WH3107> and Elihu, <WH453> and Zillethai, <WH6769> captains <WH7218> of thousands <WH505> who were of Manasseh. <WH4519>
They helped <WH5826> David <WH1732> against the band <WH1416> of rovers: <WH1368> for they were all mighty men of valor, <WH2428> and were captains <WH8269> in the army. <WH6635>
For from <WH6256> day <WH3117> to day <WH3117> men came <WH935> to David <WH1732> to help <WH5826> him, <WH1419> until there was a great army, <WH4264> like the army <WH4264> of God. <WH430>

These are the numbers <WH4557> of the heads <WH7218> of those who were armed <WH2502> for war, <WH6635> who came <WH935> to David <WH1732> to Hebron, <WH2275> to turn <WH5437> the kingdom <WH4438> of Saul <WH7586> to him, <WH6310> according to the word of Yahweh. <WH3068>
The children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> who bore <WH5375> shield <WH6793> and spear <WH7420> were six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> and eight <WH8083> hundred, <WH3967> armed <WH2502> for war. <WH6635>
Of the children <WH1121> of Simeon, <WH8095> mighty men <WH1368> of valor <WH2428> for the war, <WH6635> seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> and one hundred. <WH3967>
Of the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred. <WH3967>
Jehoiada <WH3077> was the leader <WH5057> of the household of Aaron; <WH175> and with him were three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred, <WH3967>
and Zadok, <WH6659> a young man <WH5288> mighty <WH1368> of valor, <WH2428> and of his father <WH1>'s house <WH1004> twenty <WH6242> - two <WH8147> captains. <WH8269>

Of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin, <WH1144> the brothers <WH251> of Saul, <WH7586> three <WH7969> thousand: <WH505> for hitherto the greatest <WH4768> part of them had kept <WH8104> their allegiance <WH4931> to the house <WH1004> of Saul. <WH7586>

Of the children <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> eight <WH8083> hundred, <WH3967> mighty <WH1368> men <WH582> of valor, <WH2428> famous <WH8034> men in their fathers <WH1>' houses. <WH1004>
Of the half-tribe <WH2677> <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519> eighteen <WH8083> thousand, <WH505> who were mentioned <WH5344> by name, <WH8034> to come <WH935> and make David <WH1732> king. <WH4427>

Of the children <WH1121> of Issachar, <WH3485> men who had understanding <WH998> of the times, <WH6256> to know <WH3045> what Israel <WH3478> ought to do, <WH6213> their heads <WH7218> were two hundred; <WH3967> and all their brothers <WH251> were at their commandment. <WH6310>

Of Zebulun, <WH2074> such as were able to go out <WH3318> in the army, <WH6635> who could set <WH6186> the battle <WH4421> in array, <WH3627> with all kinds of instruments of war, <WH4421> fifty <WH2572> thousand, <WH505> and who could command <WH5737> and were not of double <WH3820> heart. <WH3820>
Of Naphtali <WH5321> one thousand <WH505> captains, <WH8269> and with them with shield <WH6793> and spear <WH2595> thirty <WH7970> - seven <WH7651> thousand. <WH505>
Of the Danites <WH1839> who could set <WH6186> the battle <WH4421> in array, <WH6242> twenty - eight <WH8083> thousand <WH505> six <WH8337> hundred. <WH3967>
Of Asher, <WH836> such as were able to go out <WH3318> in the army, <WH6635> who could set <WH6186> the battle <WH4421> in array, <WH705> forty thousand. <WH505>

On the other side <WH5676> of the Jordan, <WH3383> of the Reubenites, <WH7206> and the Gadites, <WH1425> and of the half <WH2677> - tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> with all kinds of instruments <WH3627> of war <WH6635> for the battle, <WH4421> one hundred <WH3967> twenty <WH6242> thousand. <WH505>

All these being men <WH582> of war, <WH4421> who could order <WH5737> the battle array, <WH4634> came <WH935> with a perfect <WH8003> heart <WH3820> to Hebron, <WH2275> to make David <WH1732> king <WH4427> over all Israel: <WH3478> and all the rest <WH7611> also of Israel <WH3478> were of one <WH259> heart <WH3824> to make David <WH1732> king. <WH4427>
They were there with David <WH1732> three <WH7969> days, <WH3117> eating <WH398> and drinking; <WH8354> for their brothers <WH251> had made preparation for them. <WH3559>

Moreover those who were near <WH7138> to them, <WH3485> as far as Issachar and Zebulun <WH2074> and Naphtali, <WH5321> brought <WH935> bread <WH3899> on donkeys, <WH2543> and on camels, <WH1581> and on mules, <WH6505> and on oxen, <WH1241> food <WH3978> of meal, <WH7058> cakes <WH1690> of figs, <WH6778> and clusters of raisins, and wine, <WH3196> and oil, <WH8081> and cattle, <WH1241> and sheep <WH6629> in abundance: <WH7230> for there was joy <WH8057> in Israel. <WH3478>
